Ed Sheeran Joins Jimmy Fallon To Play â€˜Shape Of Youâ€™ On Classroom Instruments ğŸ¤ And now I'm singing like... ğŸ¤ By Lee Moran Ed Sheeran schooled Jimmy Fallon in the art of music as they played his new hit â€œShape of Youâ€ on classroom instruments. On Mondayâ€™s broadcast of â€œThe Tonight Show,â€ the British pop star was joined by Fallon and his house band The Roots for the playground-style rendition. 
Who knew that a banana-shaped percussion shaker could be so soulful?
